profiles.Fact: Despite it's unlikely locale, the Skylarks attract the best of NFL talent thanks to Southport's subtropical Florida-like climate and what some have called 'exploitative' visa arrangements
Rhumba and Mora are the real Esquel Collies. One year they killed 16 birds by grabbing them out of the sky. Now we're gonna crush it like they crush little birdie bones!

profiles.Fact: Packers FC were originally a Peckham-based association football club, but after growing tired of low pay and nil-nil draws, they chose to move the team to the desirable fish-packing district of New England and take up a more interesting sport. (Fact added by the editor)

profiles.Connection: Josh Kendrew is my brother in law and invited us to join
profiles.Fact: After doing abysmally for a couple of decades, Hugh Laurie and Tony Robinson bought out the team to see if they could finally take them to the playoffs and ultimately the Super Bowl.

profiles.Connection: Invited by Andy. Known him for quite a while due to common hometown!
profiles.Fact: Naperville is the city I live in (~30 miles west of Chicago) and Bearcats is the name of the athletics teams at the University of Cincinnati, where I’m employed. It was a historic season for the Cincinnati Bearcats football team last season, the first non-power 5 conference team to make the playoffs, and I really got into college football for the first time and made it to a game, so I had to name my team after them!

profiles.Connection: As with everyone, I know Trebs.
profiles.FanFor: 10 years, since Kap was my boy
profiles.Fact: They’ve been in the playoffs fewer times than the Detroit Lions
